Kenya: s international ease-of-doing-business rankings were mentioned and confirmed to have improved from a low of 136th globally in 2014 to 56th globally and third in sub-Saharan Africa.
The president: s claims regarding Kenya's improved trade within the East African Community and loosened trade regulations across the continent were verified.
The World Bank: s annual report on the ease of doing business was referenced as a source of verification for Kenya's ranking.
